title: Bike Rack Geometry Comparison | RambleRack® VertLock™ Technology
content:
Our friends at RIGd Supply just launched this RambleRack video as a companion to their Bike Rack Geometry Comparison, showcasing VertLock™ Technology.

RIGd states that the RambleRack® Heavy Duty Hitch Bike Rack is the world’s safest bike rack. Patent pending VertLock™ geometry keeps your bike locked in the rack regardless of the bike’s tire pressure or any amount of extreme driving.

RambleRack can hold up to 150 lbs of bike per tray, keeping even the heaviest e-bikes safe and secure. No matter where you take your bikes, RambleRack® is Built to Ramble™

Learn more about the RambleRack at RIGd.
